attributes.data-state: string - data attributes for state management (open|closed|etc)

layout._comment: LAYOUT PROPERTIES ONLY - Use camelCase for property names

responsive._comment: ONLY properties that CHANGE at each breakpoint - NO repetition

children._comment: Recursive structure - same fields as parent

structure.content: string - text content or {{placeholder}} for dynamic content

patterns: string - ARIA patterns used (e.g., WAI-ARIA Tabs pattern, Dialog pattern)
keyboard_navigation: string - keyboard shortcuts (e.g., Tab/Shift+Tab navigation, Escape to close)
accessibility.focus_management: string - focus trap strategy, initial focus target
screen_reader_notes: string - screen reader announcements (e.g., Dialog opened, Tab selected)

medium.use_case: string - Default size for most contexts

variant_name.description: string - when to use this variant

usage_context: string - typical usage scenarios (e.g., Landing page hero, Product listing grid)
accessibility_tips: string - accessibility best practices (e.g., Ensure heading hierarchy, Add aria-label)

_field_rules.schema: $schema MUST reference W3C Design Tokens format specification
_field_rules.semantic_tags: structure.tag MUST use semantic HTML5 tags (header, nav, main, section, article, aside, footer)
_field_rules.aria: structure.attributes MUST include ARIA attributes where applicable (role, aria-label, aria-describedby)
_field_rules.token_refs: structure.layout MUST use {token.path} syntax for all spacing values
_field_rules.no_visual: structure.layout MUST NOT include visual styling (colors, fonts, shadows - those belong in design-tokens)
_field_rules.layout_only: structure.layout contains ONLY layout properties (display, grid, flex, position, spacing)
_field_rules.breakpoints: structure.responsive MUST define breakpoint-specific overrides matching breakpoint tokens
_field_rules.no_repetition: structure.responsive uses ONLY the properties that change at each breakpoint (no repetition)
_field_rules.recursive: structure.children inherits same structure recursively for nested elements
_field_rules.accessibility: accessibility MUST include patterns, keyboard_navigation, focus_management, screen_reader_notes
_field_rules.usage_guide_universal: usage_guide REQUIRED for universal components (buttons, inputs, forms, cards, navigation, etc.)
_field_rules.usage_guide_specialized: usage_guide OPTIONAL for specialized components (can be simplified or omitted)
_field_rules.code_snippets: extraction_metadata.code_snippets ONLY present in Code Import mode
